nodes.text: Piit, also known by the nickname "Peg Leg Piit", was a Weequay female who served as a member of Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang during the Clone Wars. She was one of the few female Weequay present at the Ohnaka Gang's base on the planet Florrum and was involved in many of Ohnaka's operations, including the kidnapping of Count Dooku and the Raid on the Crucible. Piit's right leg was replaced with a peg leg some time prior to Dooku's kidnapping.
